definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink
(bird species of China) rosy minivet (Pericrocotus roseus)
(bird species of China) rosy starling (Pastor roseus)
(bird species of China) roseate tern (Sterna dougallii)
(bird species of China) rosy pipit (Anthus roseatus)
(bird species of China) Asian rosy finch (Leucosticte arctoa)

sentences.english: This one was heart-shaped all satiny red with a pink bow on top.
sentences.chinese: 就像一隻粉紅色的蝴蝶停在一朵深紅的玫瑰上面。

sentences.english: Geogre is not going to paint it pink.
sentences.chinese: 喬治不打算把它刷成粉紅色。

sentences.english: The colours used are a selection of lovely soft greens and pinks.
sentences.chinese: 採用的顏色是一系列可愛的淡綠色和粉紅色。

sentences.english: In vernal breeze still smile pink peach blossoms full blown.
sentences.chinese: 在春風裏粉紅色的桃花依然笑着盛開。

sentences.english: He's part of that Pink Panther group that held up a jewelry store in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 他是在巴黎開珠寶店的粉紅豹不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: Befriender:Most ghosts turned into good guys with Pink Slime.
sentences.chinese: 大多數鬼變成好人與粉紅泥。

sentences.english: She was hatted a big white straw hat to match her pink dress.
sentences.chinese: 她戴了一頂白色的大草帽來配搭那件粉紅色的連衣裙。

sentences.english: There are also gorgeous mosques here, such as the Nasir al-Mulk Mosque.
sentences.chinese: 這裏也有美麗的清真寺，例如粉紅清真寺。

sentences.english: Her face was pink, too. This made her like a slim and graceful flower.
sentences.chinese: 她的臉也是粉紅色的，象一朵亭亭玉立的花。

sentences.english: Your kiss, as if I fall into a sweet pink fruit basket.
sentences.chinese: 你的吻，將我甜在粉紅色果藍裏。

sentences.english: Rosy pipits seem to have broad and long supercilium in non-breeding plumage.
sentences.chinese: 粉紅胸鷚似乎在非繁殖羽時有粗而長的眉線。

sentences.english: IT chose the red sweater ratIT dawn the pink first.
sentences.chinese: 她選中那件紅毛衣而無所不能那件粉紅色的。

sentences.english: Instead of being faint or light pink, these new diamonds are hot pink.
sentences.chinese: 反而受到微弱或淺粉色，這些新的鑽石熱粉紅。

sentences.english: The softening effect of pink clay refines the skin's texture while toning the epidermis.
sentences.chinese: 粉紅泥的柔軟作用在強健表皮的同時使肌膚細膩。

sentences.english: I'd rather wear blue than pink.
sentences.chinese: 我寧願空藍色的也不願穿粉紅色的。

sentences.english: He sat down to lap the soup with his long pink tongue.
sentences.chinese: 他坐下來用他那粉紅色的長舌頭舔那碗湯。
